title: St, Paul's Pillar Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Greek, Cypriot, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family-run restaurant serving traditional Cypriot food. One of the owners is vegetarian and wants to emphasize Cypriot vegetable side dishes by offering two vegetarian multi-dish menus both of which can be vegan. NOTE: Please send exact map coordinates to happycow!
